# Introduction

**Official Website is [http://yuanchao-xu.github.io/gferplot](http://yuanchao-xu.github.io/gferplot), where manuals and more details can be found.**

Focuses on data visualization in green finance and environmental 
  risk research and analysis.

**If you feel gfer is of a little help, please cite it as following:**

Yuanchao Xu (2017). gferplot: Green Finance and Environmental Risk Visualization. R package version 0.1.6.
  https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=gfer
